title: Entanglement, Maxine Waters, The WildNOut w/ DCYoungFly Karlous Miller & Chico Bean | Ep. 246
itunes:title: Entanglement, Maxine Waters, The WildNOut w/ DCYoungFly Karlous Miller & Chico Bean | Ep. 246
description:
On this classic hilarious podcast, the crew breaks down that waffle house life and Uber Eats stealin ya food. Chico explains his love and appreciation for all types of music and how he recently discovered Gospel. Chico also reveals his liberating new hairstyle. Grab some Merch! https://85apparelco.com/ The new kings of comedy tell the story of how they found out Wild N Out was over and how Nick Cannon made the production of the show a classroom for the ensemble cast. They share some moments that the world doesn't know about and remember some of the fans favorite moments. Karlous Miller shares some sensei-like information on how to succeed in comedy in a group setting and Mr. Miller provides his hilarious perspective on "Them And They" August Alsina, Will Smith and Jada Smith been in the news and the fellas discuss "The entanglement" and Will Smith's hypothetical diss song. Chico Bean addresses how Breonna Taylor hasn't received justice and sends a message to Daniel Cameron to take action as the Attorney General of Kentucky. DC Young Fly has a funny azz song for Meg The Stallion and tries to understand how the Torey Lanez situation makes sense. DC also addresses the senseless violence that took the life of his cousin. Plus, Wheelchairman has been roasting Chico Bean and ackin a fool and so the crew takes a look at Mr. WheelChairman's fine work online and errbody shows some love for Auntie Maxine Waters community efforts and pay tribute to John Lewis and C.T. Vivian. Video of the Man with the Hair Piece: https://twitter.com/venessahjah/statu... DC Young Fly on Eightyvibe: https://youtu.be/nasw-3oYW4k WheelChair Man: https://www.instagram.com/wheelchairm... DC Young Fly Dancing with Erica: https://www.instagram.com/p/CCeVD8lj3f7/ Maxine Waters: https://www.instagram.com/p/CC6C-fyBkuv/ #RipPrincessErica #johnlewis #CTVivian FOLLOW THE CREW KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/ DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/ CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/ JOE T. NEWMAN - http://www.ayoungplayer.com CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/ LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_/ J.O.N - https://www.instagram.com/heeeyj_o_n/ CRIAG GRAVES - https://www.instagram.com/craigshoots23/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
